languages.text: Сломив оборону, местное население разграбило корабль, а выживший экипаж был угнан на производства. В ответ на самоуправство Адептус Администратум начал изнурительную тяжбу против Вольного Торговца.

The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Сломив оборону, местное население разграбило корабль, а выживший экипаж был угнан на производства. В ответ на самоуправство Адептус Администратум начал изнурительную тяжбу против Вольного Торговца.

traits.locale_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.
Miraculously, the surviving part of the crew itself handed over the cargo to your services in gratitude for the rescue.

The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.
Miraculously, the surviving part of the crew placed the cargo in your capable hands in gratitude for the rescue.

The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Les habitants de la colonie forcent les défenses du vaisseau, pillent ses cales et réduisent à la servitude les survivants de l'équipage. En réponse à cet acte séditieux, l'Adeptus Administratum engage des poursuites interminables à l'encontre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Les habitants de la colonie forcent les défenses du vaisseau, pillent ses cales et réduisent à la servitude les survivants de l'équipage. En réponse à cet acte séditieux, l'Adeptus Administratum engage des poursuites interminables à l'encontre {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: コロニーの住人たちは船の防御を破り、船倉から略奪し、生き残ったクルーを労働に従事させた。この無許可の行為に対し、帝国行政局は自由開拓者に対し、うんざりするほど長期にわたる訴訟を起こした。
languages.original_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: コロニーの住人たちは船の防御を破り、船倉から略奪し、生き残ったクルーを労働に従事させた。この無許可の行為に対し、帝国行政局は自由開拓者に対し、うんざりするほど長期にわたる訴訟を起こした。

languages.text: 殖民地的居民突破了舰船的防御，洗劫了船舱，命令所有幸存的船员去殖民地上干活。这种未经授权的行为传到了帝国内政部耳中，内政部对行商浪人的行为提起了漫长的诉讼。
languages.original_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 殖民地的居民突破了舰船的防御，洗劫了船舱，命令所有幸存的船员去殖民地上干活。这种未经授权的行为传到了帝国内政部耳中，内政部对行商浪人的行为提起了漫长的诉讼。

languages.text: Los habitantes de la colonia atravesaron las defensas de la nave, saquearon sus bodegas y pusieron a trabajar a los tripulantes supervivientes. En respuesta a estas acciones no autorizadas, el Adeptus Administratum ha presentado una larga y tediosa querella contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Los habitantes de la colonia atravesaron las defensas de la nave, saquearon sus bodegas y pusieron a trabajar a los tripulantes supervivientes. En respuesta a estas acciones no autorizadas, el Adeptus Administratum ha presentado una larga y tediosa querella contra {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Die Bewohner der Kolonie durchbrechen die Verteidigung des Schiffs, plündern die Frachträume und versklaven die überlebenden Crewmitglieder. Als Reaktion auf dieses nicht genehmigte Verhalten hat das Adeptus Administratum {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} angeklagt, was ein quälend langwieriges Verfahren zur Folge hatte.
languages.original_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Die Bewohner der Kolonie durchbrechen die Verteidigung des Schiffs, plündern die Frachträume und versklaven die überlebenden Crewmitglieder. Als Reaktion auf dieses nicht genehmigte Verhalten hat das Adeptus Administratum {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} angeklagt, was ein quälend langwieriges Verfahren zur Folge hatte.

languages.text: Koloni sakinleri, geminin savunmasını aşarak ambarları yağmaladı ve hayatta kalan mürettebatı iş başına getirdi. Adeptus Administratum, bu onaysız eyleme karşılık olarak Hür Tacir'e karşı bıktıracak derecede uzun süreli bir dava açtı.
languages.original_text: The colony dwellers broke through the ship's defences, plundered the holds, and put the surviving crew to work. In response to this unsanctioned act, the Adeptus Administratum has filed a tediously protracted suit against the Rogue Trader.
